title: Utilization of green resource based Mimosa Pudica hydrogel powder into cellulose acetate based polymeric membrane as absorbent: A sustainable approach towards female hygiene application
content:
RSC Sustain., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SU00381K, Paper

Roshni Pattanayak, Sukanya Pradhan, Smita Mohanty
This study presents the development of a novel membrane-based absorbent by incorporating Mimosa Pudica hydrogel (MPH) powder, derived from the mucilage of its seeds into a cellulose acetate polymer matrix...
